name: Dreamwhale III
description:
Travel through the colonies of Kadonia and defeat the evil menace threatening the peace. Get stronger and level up, collect equipment and items and finally enter the castle of the evil mage.

Features:

  • 21 different enemies (including a whale)
  • 8 (+1) Colors
  • 7 maps
  • A ship
  • 1 hour of gameplay
  • Includes a game manual (it is recommended to read it before playing)
